Chapter 4 Recipe Object Lets explore the recipe object library(tidymodels) data(iris) iris_split <- initial_split(iris, prop = 0.75, strata = Species) iris_training <- iris_split %>% training() iris_testing <- iris_split %>% testing() Explore the training dataset iris_training %>% glimpse() ## Rows: 111 ## Columns: 5 ## $ Sepal.Length <dbl> 5.1, 4.9, 5.4, 4.6, 5.0, 4.4, 4.9, 5.4, 4.8, 4.8, 5.8, 5.… ## $ Sepal.Width <dbl> 3.5, 3.0, 3.9, 3.4, 3.4, 2.9, 3.1, 3.7, 3.4, 3.0, 4.0, 3.… ## $ Petal.Length <dbl> 1.4, 1.4, 1.7, 1.4, 1.5, 1.4, 1.5, 1.5, 1.6, 1.4, 1.2, 1.… ## $ Petal.Width <dbl> 0.2, 0.2, 0.4, 0.3, 0.2, 0.2, 0.1, 0.2, 0.2, 0.1, 0.2, 0.… ## $ Species <fct> setosa, setosa, setosa, setosa, setosa, setosa, setosa, s… Explore the testing dataset iris_testing %>% glimpse() ## Rows: 39 ## Columns: 5 ## $ Sepal.Length <dbl> 4.7, 4.6, 5.0, 4.3, 5.7, 5.4, 5.0, 5.0, 4.8, 5.4, 4.9, 4.… ## $ Sepal.Width <dbl> 3.2, 3.1, 3.6, 3.0, 4.4, 3.4, 3.0, 3.4, 3.1, 3.4, 3.1, 3.… ## $ Petal.Length <dbl> 1.3, 1.5, 1.4, 1.1, 1.5, 1.7, 1.6, 1.6, 1.6, 1.5, 1.5, 1.… ## $ Petal.Width <dbl> 0.2, 0.2, 0.2, 0.1, 0.4, 0.2, 0.2, 0.4, 0.2, 0.4, 0.2, 0.… ## $ Species <fct> setosa, setosa, setosa, setosa, setosa, setosa, setosa, s… create the recipe object recipe01 <- recipe(Species~., data = iris_training) %>% step_normalize(all_numeric()) recipe01 ## Recipe ## ## Inputs: ## ## role #variables ## outcome 1 ## predictor 4 ## ## Operations: ## ## Centering and scaling for all_numeric()
